overview: ...At last, the unthinkable! Is it the money, the obligations of being an actor capable of playing any role, or is it the facination of trying something totally forbidden...what is it that will drive STRAIGHT MEN to cast aside the barriers of a lifetime consumed by the pursuit straight sex and surrender themselves to the taboos and hidden pleasures of gay sex? Whatever the reason, the hard and hardbodied men of Barracks 69 obviously loved pulling out their long tools and sharing the pleasure with their fellow soldiers. Mercenaries have always been 'soldiers of fortune', the 'fortune' here is being stationed with a handsome bunch of horny straight guys who can't get enough of each others cocks! Featuring the incredible performance of the astounding 'Rocque' and his 14" weapon of destruction!
title: Mercenaries: ...At Last, The Unthinkable
